title: Sopa de lentejas (Andalucian lentil soup)
ingredients: ['250g dried brown lentils, soaked overnight and drained', '2 rashers streaky bacon, chopped', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 large plum tomatoes, chopped', '2 Spanish chorizo sausages, casing removed, chopped', '1 bay leaf', '500ml water, or as needed', '2 potatoes, peeled and cubed']
